main event: A civilian observed a stationary UFO near Pontiac, Michigan on 29 August 1960.
interesting points: The sighting lasted approximately 20-40 minutes,The object was visually reported as being around 30-40 feet in diameter and 10-15 feet thick,The observer noted the object was bright and moving rapidly just before becoming stationary,The report was forwarded for analysis by the Chicago Air Defense Sector,The case concluded with insufficient data to identify the phenomenon.
